Below are my notes from Andrew Ng's talk, "The State of Artificial Intelligence". See the [YouTube video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NKpuX_yzdYs).

```{r read-notes}

notes <- magick::image_read_pdf("data/Andrew Ng State of Artificial Intelligence 2017 YouTube video.pdf", density = 100)

```

```{r write-notes1, out.width="100%"}
notes[1]
```
